summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in node-fetch (CVE-2022-2596) with CVSS score 5.9 affecting the documentation build process through docusaurus-plugin-snipsync. The vulnerability is a denial of service issue in node-fetch prior to version 3.2.10.
userImpact: Users building the documentation are exposed to a potential denial of service vulnerability through a transitive dependency.
rootCause: node-fetch version 2.6.7 contains CVE-2022-2596, a DoS vulnerability that could be exploited via network requests under specific conditions.
proposedFix: Upgrade node-fetch to version 3.2.10 or later to resolve CVE-2022-2596.
resolutionDetails: The issue was automatically closed by Mend after the vulnerable library was either marked as ignored or removed from the dependency tree.
keyQuote: Denial of Service in GitHub repository node-fetch/node-fetch prior to 3.2.10
